Text: Blast! They've broken through the second layer, but there are yet two more wards behind that! Fight on!

Climb the tower, and man the dragonkiller!
Steady now! Time your shot!

A hit!
The monster felt that one, by the Fury!

Bah, a wasted bolt.
We'd best make the other dragonkillers count!

Biasts!
Don't let them rush the cannons!
Another ward down! Bleed them! Bleed them for every step! Our defenses grow thin...

They mean to overwhelm us...
Prepare the snares! Slow their advance!
Well done!

Damn these Dravanian devils!
Keep faith, now! This battle is far from lost!

It dodged the bloody missile!
A creature of that size...

Horde reinforcements have arrived!
Put down those aevis!

The wards are destroyed! Pull back!
We make our final stand before the Arc of the Worthy!

If it breathes, we are lost!
Use both the snares! Choke its throat closed!

Now! To the dragonkiller!
Skewer the foul beast while it thrashes!
By all that is holy...

A fine shot!
Now we finish this scaled demon once and for all!

More Dravanians have landed!
Slay those drakes before they reach the powder kegs!

Move away from the kegs!
You'll be caught in the blast!
Now! Ignite the powder kegs!

Hah! That inflicted some hurt!
Back into the fray!
Bah! The timing was off...

The Arc of the Worthy is at our backs!
May Halone grant us the strength to die well in its shadow!
Daniffen's Collar is naught but dust on the Sea of Clouds. What hope now for Ishgard...?

Shout your triumph to the heavens, my friends!
This day belongs to Ishgard─and her blessed defenders!
Defeat Vishap
To the Arc of the Worthy

I trust you know your lives are forfeit.
I'll cut you to pieces!
Filthy rats!
And now the final curtain!
This shall be a mercy!
What!? No... NO!

Bloodlust
Dance to the song of ringing steel!
Furious as a blaze!
Unyielding as the earth!
Take wing, ye souls of war!
Prepare thyself!
Rejoice in the glory of combat!
Thou hast bested me...
Rejoice in the glory of combat!

Have I come so far just to die...?
Nidhogg... Damn you...
Estinien's Vitality

I will enfeeble the wyrm with the Eye!
You must strike whilst he is weak!

Impudent mortal!
Thou wouldst use mine own eye against me!?

Attend me, my kindred!
Slay these treacherous children of man!

My patience for your incessant struggling doth falter.
Succumb now to the might of a great wyrm!

Such unthinkable power... I must use the Eye to shield us!
Protect me whilst I draw forth its strength!
'Tis done! I am prepared!

Loathsome vermin!
You shall wither in the furnace of my wrath!
Treacherous mortals!
Vengeance!
To the abyss with you!
My rage will consume you!
Tremble at my fury!

Impudent mortal!
Thou wouldst use mine own eye against me!?

Attend me, my kindred!
Slay these treacherous children of man!
My rage will consume you!
Tremble at my fury!
Treacherous mortals!

No sooner do I clear away the rabble...
Let's get this over with, shall we?
Turrets, deploy!

Your reputation is well deserved.
Very well, let us try something different.
The day is yours...but we will meet again.

Come! We settle this once and for all!
Mortal scum! I will entomb you in ice!
Let us see you withstand two magicks at once!
Fires of creation─arise!
My magicks flow as one!
Ahhh, the power of Darkness surges... Tranquil as ice, vicious as fire!
Feel the might of our magicks combined!
Not even the laws of creation can withstand the tides of chaos!
Stubborn mortals... Very well, we will show you our true strength!
Know eternal despair! Fire and ice consume you!
Even without the blessing of Light... How is this possible!?
Our might knows no bounds!
Defeat Raskovnik
Defeat Myath
Defeat Tioman

You dare intrude upon this sacred mount!?
My jaws shall run red with the blood of men!

Arrogant insects!
Be crushed beneath the weight of my fury!

Nidhogg, my beloved...
Avenge me...
Limit Break
Your feeble light shall fade before my brilliance!
O Ascalon! Drink deep of the power of slumbering gods!
I shall end your vain struggle!

Y-You survived my divine reckoning!? Impossible!
This is the power of Light?

You think to withstand the fury of my divine will?
Kneel now before the unfettered glory of the Eye!

A netherling dares defile our sacred isle?
You will suffer the storm of Canu Vanu's divine justice!

Yes, the totems!
Stir to life, they do, at Canu Vanu's command!

Come, my totems!
Crush this netherling like the vile insect it is!

The clouds come, and the skies darken...
No... This cannot...be...

Pshhhkohhh... Gobwalkers, stand firm! Slay trespassing uplanders!
Uplanders cannot gain ground─rain gobbie bombs on uplanders!
Gobbies and uplanders are evenmatched... Very well. Readymake big guns!
Pssshkohoho... Ready...aim...FIRE!

Uplanders are stubborn, need lesson teachings!
Illuminati─reload and fire!

Ah, the delectable aroma of terror.
Long has it been since last I feasted...
My minions shall infest your world!

I gorge upon fear, and spew it forth as bile!
All shall be tainted with pestilence!

No! This cannot be...
I am endless, as the stars...

Meddling mortals...
Arise and taste vengeance, my ravenous kindred!

You would intrude upon the queen's very bedchamber?
Only agonizing death can cure such temerity!
Such plump souls, ready for the harvest!
Your fate shall be throttled in serpents' coils!
Return to me, my wayward claws!

Come, my children.
There is mortal blood to spill!
My queen! May your shadow fall over all...
Graaaaaaaaar!
Clear Telmatology
Prune the Rose Garden
Clear Eremology
Slay the queen hawk
Clear the Study
Clear the Manifest
Clear Where Hearts Leap
Clear Where All Witness

Croaaak! Who dares approach the tower!?
Ones with ears to listen!? How wonderful!
It's...it's not easy being... \\<croak>
Limit Break

Pestilent northerners...
You shall regret the decision to loosen my fetters!

The equilibrium of life...
I shall tip thy scales and partake of thy bounteous energy!

Patience and penance...
For millennia have I yearned to enact this vengeance!

I am the end and the beginning!
By my touch shall your wretched lives be blessed!

I am the incarnation of life!
I cannot perish...cannot wither...

To die here is a mercy...
You shall not witness your lands when I rend them asunder!

You have dimmed my boundless light.
What power of death do you mortals wield...?
Unfortunate eggs destroyed
Defeat Achamoth
Eliminate the threat in the Sanctum of Dreams
Defeat the winged lion
Eliminate the threat in the Crystallum

I am the steward of life in Amdapor!
By the order of the magi, all who trespass shall perish!

Life passes unto death.
By the grace of the magi, I shall rise again!

Even stone is blighted by the rasping of the wind.
By the mercy of the magi, my wounds be cured!

Even rock is diminished by the gnawing of the waves.
By the bounty of the magi, my form be restored!

The enemy is too great...
Flee, my magi masters─flee and rebuild...

Amdapor...is...sacred.
It will not...be...despoiled...

This...cannot...be...
My purpose...is failed...

Pssshkoh... Longwait, do we for uplander subjects!
Pssshkoh... No! Must have more goblixer!
Pssshkohhh! Uplanders cower at power of Clevering!
Pssshkoh... Come, mindfruit! Come and see uplanders dumbstruck at gobbie masterpiece!

Pshhhkohhh... Uplanders, welcome to public execution! There is no tailturn from Gobflyer X!
Quickthinx is done toying with uplanders!
Shanoa hurry-scuttles to laugh at uplander doom? Quickthinx makes execution more laugh-worthy!
Pshhhkohhh... Uplanders backstrike well... Too well...
Forward, forward! Ishgard! Ishgard!
The Fury's Gaze is upon us!
Come, Ishgardians! Show us your mettle!
Ishgard! Rally to the first commander!
Victory is within our grasp! Ishgard! Ishgard!
Stand fast, brothers and sisters! Ishgard! Ishgard!
Aye, that's the spirit! Flames, Adders, Maelstrom─forward!
The Fury's Gaze has fallen upon...General Raubahn and...

<split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>, Lord Emmanellain─attend to the marked ones!
They fall! Find the next─press our advantage!
Defeat the alliance forces!
By the Fury, it's just the two of them in there!
On your guard, Lord Emmanellain! Our fight is not yet finished!
That all you bastards've got!? Come on, then! Give us another!

Gods, they just keep coming!
But we cannot...we will not yield!
You hear me, old <If(PlayerParameter(4))>girl<Else/>boy</If>!? Don't you dare lose!
Bwahahaha! Brilliant, brilliant! You are indeed the Warrior of Light...
...But I am the Bull of Ala Mhigo!
Strength, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>, strength! Now is your chance!
Strike him down! For the glory of Ishgard!
Aye, all right... Take your victory. You've earned it.
Ye'll be facin' me first. I won't hold back, so be quick on yer feet!
For this exercise, ye'll be learnin' avoidance!
An enemy often tips his hand before a big strike, so save yerself some hurt an' step clear o' the impact!
Show ye've learned to get out o' the way, an' ye pass.
Time I switched to a new technique! Better change yer dance steps!

Now it's my turn!
I'll teach you not to ignore a ranged opponent!
Breathe! Keep yer eyes open! Move them feet!
Think ye can dodge us both!?
Yer last test'll be to evade both foes at the same time!
Keep calm, an' watch for the signs!
最後までへばるなよ？

Keep it up, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>lass<Else/>lad</If>!
Yer almost at the end of it!
Now show me you can avoid both at once!
Stay calm, and watch for the signs!
For this exercise, you'll be learning avoidance!
An enemy often tips his hand before a big attack, and your best defense is to skip out of the way!
You pass the exercise once I decide you've learned this lesson.
Now you must evade both attackers at once!
Remain calm, and watch for the signs!
This training exercise focuses on evasion!
An enemy often tips his hand before a big attack, so you must learn when to adjust your position!
Success hinges upon your ability to avoid being struck!

Do not surrender to panic!
Move swiftly and decisively!
Judge where an attack will land, and do not be there when it does!
もっと激しくいってみよう！
油断は大敵ですよ……！

Stay alert!
There is but a short time remaining!

Stay focused!
The exercise nears its end!
Avoid the enemy's attacks!
Watch yer opponent carefully. When ye see an attack comin', move out o' the strike zone!
Watch your opponent carefully. When you see an attack coming, move out of the strike zone!

So for this exercise, ye'll be learnin' about “enmity” an' how to build it.
Enmity is a measure o' how badly a foe wants to kill ye, an' it's yer job to be at the top of every enemy's list.

The best way to establish yerself as a threat?
String together some nasty combinations!
In yer case, I'd start out with a <sheet(Action,9,0)>, an' follow it up with a <sheet(Action,15,0)>!
In yer case, I'd start out with a <sheet(Action,31,0)>, an' follow it up with a <sheet(Action,37,0)>!
In yer case, I'd start out with a <sheet(Action,3617,0)>, an' follow it up with a <sheet(Action,3623,0)>!
Show me a solid series of blows, an' I'll consider yer lesson learned.

Remember the order I told ye, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>lass<Else/>lad</If>!
<sheet(Action,9,0)> first! <sheet(Action,15,0)> second!

Use the combo advised by the master to attack the striking dummy!

Hit that wooden warrior with yer combination!

Hit that wooden warrior with yer combination!

Don't try nothin' fancy! Get the order wrong more'n four times an' we start over!
When it comes to yer place in a party, yer the wall o' steel what takes the enemy hits.
Soakin' up the pain, an' keepin' yer mates safe─that's what ye need to focus on most durin' battle.
